name: IMFRCHCS Fitness Tracker
description: IMFRCHCS Fitness Tracker, Smart Watch with 1.47 inches inches Touch Display, 137+ Sport Modes Activity Tracker with 24/7 Heart Rate Blood Oxygen and Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof Tracker for Women Men Kids.
details: 💙【Ultra-large 1.47 inches TFT Display】The large 1.47 inches TFT display offers a 10.5% larger viewing area, making it easier to read. Whether you're checking your heart rate on a run or your messages on the way to work, see everything you need with the flick of your B6 Fitness Tracker.

💙【130+ Multiple Fitness Modes】No matter you are into outdoor or indoor workouts, there is something for you. B6 activity tracker comes with 7 professional workout modes – including walking, running, cycling, swimming – offer high-level fitness tracking with personalized guidance. You can also find your favourite workouts from one of the 130 customized workout modes to help you stay active and engaged.

💙【24/7 Heart Rate & Blood Oxygen Monitor】The B6 fitness tracker supports real-time dynamic heart rate and blood oxygen monitoring, so you can view the changes at a glance. The alerts will be sent when your heart rate/SpO2 is high, guarding your health around the clock.

💙【Sleep Better Every Night】With the help of scientific, meticulous sleep monitoring technologies, the B6 Smart Watch records your real-time sleep condition at different stages such as deep sleep, light sleep and REM, improving your sleeping habits and the quality of your sleep.
💙【IP68 Waterproof Watch】Whether enjoy cool splashes in shallow water or snorkeling, you can wear your tracker all the time. 5 ATM water resistance rating, making daily wear more worry-free.

💙【Convenience in Daily Life】The fitness tracker can notify you of new messages, incoming calls, weather, reminders, etc., allowing you to be up to beats with your life and work. It can also make your life more convenient with music playback control, remote shutter and finding your phone.

💙【Extra-long Battery Life】Gently place the fitness tracker close to the charger and it will be automatically adsorbed for charging. The combination of low power consumption hardware and software provides up to 5-7 days of battery life, so you don't need to worry about battery life.
